page.title: 19Neighbouring villages
page.content: Brampton and Crackenthorpe are the on- ly other villages in the Long Marton block. Brampton is about three three miles from Long Marton.It is smaller and has fewer houses,fewer people,but it has it's own pub,chapel and village store. There is a small village where they hold Whist and Domino drives and some- times parties.The children are taken by bus to Appleby school. Crackenthorpe is much smaller than brampton and has no pub,store or ch- urch,children who live there are taken to Appleby school but there is no oth- er bus servise. Other than the three villages there are only scattered farms in the whole of our block.If we put all these tog- ether there would only fill about 1km square.
